translations: 同步；花样游泳（synchronised swimming的简称）；同步啮合（synchromesh的简称）；自整角机，同步机

sentences.sentence: Repeat, jettison Synchro Cannon modules immediately.
sentences.translation: 重复，立刻抛弃同步炮模块。

sentences.sentence: All right, Skull Squadron, jettison Synchro Cannon modules immediately.
sentences.translation: 好吧，骷髅中队，立刻抛弃同步炮模块。
